Generation V.Black: The tuft on its head holds water. When the level runs low, it replenishes the tuft by siphoning up water with its tail.
Generation V.White: The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.
Generation V.Black 2: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.
Generation V.White 2: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.

Generation VI.X: The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.
Generation VI.Y: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.
